name: Pizza Maker Fast Food Pie Shop - Baking Games
name_original: Pizza Maker Fast Food Pie Shop - Baking Games
description:
Finally! An awesome Pizza Pie restaurant at your very own finger tips. Join this italian restaurant and make yours today!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite pizza party recipes. Play now!

Features:
- Make dough and roll it out by dragging ingredients
- Make your red sauce, awesome feature
- Many toppings to choose from: Meats, Veggies, Cheeses, and Seasonings!
- Do you have a favorite ? Bacon, Pepperoni, Pineapple or.... Let us know
- Choose your cut. 2 slices, 4 slices, square slices.
- EAT IT ONCE! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Toppings
- Different combinations!
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself.

Download Awesome Pizza Pie Fast Food Party Restaurant Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Pizza Pie Fast Food Party Restaurant Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
